title: Kurds Blame Turkey for Hindering Exit From Syrian Border Area
text:
Kurdish forces accused Turkey and its allies of blocking their withdrawal from the border region in northeast Syria, blaming Ankara for frustrating attempts to comply with a key demand of the cease-fire negotiated with the U.S.

Ankara agreed with Washington on Thursday to a five-day truce, during which the Syrian Kurds are expected to withdraw from an area Turkey has defined as a safe zone along the two nations’ borders. Both sides have accused each other of violating the cease-fire, with a key border town at the center of...
description: Kurdish forces accused Turkey and its allies of blocking their withdrawal from the border region in northeast Syria, blaming Ankara for frustrating attempts to comply with a key demand of the cease-fire negotiated with the U.S.
